headline: Zimmer Biomet Announces FDA Breakthrough Designation for World's First Iodine-Treated Total Hip Replacement System
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (NYSE and SIX: ZBH), a global medical technology leader, today announced the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has granted Breakthrough Device Designation for the company's first-to-world iodine-treated total hip replacement system. This is the first product in Zimmer Biomet history to receive this designation.
